```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
SIMILARITY_DATA_PATH <- here("data/processed_data/processed_similaritydata.csv")
d <- read_csv(SIMILARITY_DATA_PATH)
```

```{r}
try  <- d %>% 
  mutate(combo = paste(stimulus_left, stimulus_right, sep = "&")) %>% 
  group_by(combo) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_rating = mean(rating)
  ) %>% 
  separate(combo, into = c("left", "right"), sep = "&") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = right, values_from = mean_rating) -> 
```

```{r}
try 
cmdscale(try, eig = TRUE, k = 2)
```
